Organisms (Tests by Culture and Identification)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11475-1 Microorganism identified in Unspecified specimen by Culture
    40440-0 XXX microorganism serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    62202-7 XXX microorganism DNA [Identifier] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    76346-6 Microorganism identified in Isolate by MS.MALDI-TOF
